Add to word list
used when an extra short message is added to the end of a letter after a message has already been added: PS I forgot to invite you to our party next Sunday at six. PPS Please tell Ellis that he's welcome to come too. See also
PS

written abbreviation for post postscript: used in front of a short message added after a first postscript at the end of a letter or email: PS Could you bring your notes to the meeting? PPS and don't forget to let Richard know the time's been changed. See also
